participant_1.background:
I sell cosmetics in my spare time and help my sister Madonna with her beauty business.
my suspenders sometimes make my shoulders hurt.
i like my job.
My morning routine starts with taking my allergy medication so that I can tolerate being around my neighbors' cats.
I started spending more time with my family and focusing on my own hobbies.

participant_2.background:
I'm not close to my family, but I'm trying to be.
i live in the suburbs of a major city.
I am a couponer and I need to be close to the grocery store to maximize my savings.
i am afraid of spiders.
i just lost my job and i am looking for something new.

content.text: Hey! What are you up to today?
Hey! I'm just trying to figure out what I'm going to do today. I just lost my job and I'm not sure what I want to do next.
Oh no! I'm so sorry to hear that. I'm sure you'll find something new soon. What was your old job?
I worked as a cashier at a grocery store. I'm not sure if I want to do that again, or if I want to try something new.
I see. Well, if you need any help finding a new job, I'm here for you. I'm really good at finding jobs.
Thanks! I appreciate that. I'm actually not close to my family, but I'm trying to be. I'm not sure if I want to move back in with them, or if I want to try to find a place on my own.
Oh, I see. Well, if you need a place to stay, I have a spare room in my house. I live in the suburbs of a major city, so you'd be close to the grocery store and other amenities.
That's really kind of you to offer. I'll keep that in mind.
No problem. I'm happy to help. In the meantime, I'm sure you'll find something new to do. You're a smart and capable person, and I know you'll be successful in whatever you do.
Thanks! I appreciate that. I'm trying to stay positive and hopeful. I know that I'll be okay
